snippet.title: Fire Fly for the Atari 2600
snippet.description:
All hail Mythicon!

No, seriously...PLEASE DO NOT!!!

Mythicon is one of THE worst game developers OF ALL TIME !!!
(And that where they made only 3 games for the Atari 2600. :P)

Fire Fly suffers from abysmal gameplay, horrendous background music and crappy animation.

Also you would think after defeating the last monster the game would become faster or more difficult, but no, of course not...not when the game is made by ... MYTHICON!
